elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: What are the older generation's criticisms of the younger generation?
elements.correctAnswer: The younger generation is lazy and disrespectful. An older gentleman points out: "The young should ask themselves the question: if I have other priorities, who will pay for them?"

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Why does Leonie struggle with a 40-hour week?
elements.correctAnswer: There are lots of things you can try and do (eating out, meeting up with friends, traveling, etc.).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Aleksandra Tulej criticized Generation Z on social media: "Dear Generation Z, we need to talk about your work ethic." What triggered this post?
elements.correctAnswer: This post has polarized: Two camps have formed. One side supports Aleksandra Tulej's statement and the other side vehemently rejects her criticism.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What aspects of an employer are important to Generation Z?
elements.correctAnswer: (1) flexible working time models, (2) work-life balance, (3) respect from the employer, (4) money and (5) job security

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What are the limits of Generation Z's desire for less work?
elements.correctAnswer: Those who work less also earn less. However, the cost of living (rent, health insurance premiums, food, etc.) is high. Depending on the job, a part-time salary may not be enough.
